Rise Marketing Group - Led by Former Googler

Add to Favorites
Rise Marketing Group - Led by Former Googler
Rise Above the Competition
33 Google reviews
4.7

Dedham, Massachusetts, United States

10-49

2018

A performance driven marketing firm led by a Former Googler. Our focus is SEO, performance advertising and website creation. 

Rise is a boutique agency, where we customize each marketing plan to our clients unique needs.

For SEO we specialize in content creation (based on keyword research) and boosting domain authority via link building.

For Paid Ads we specialize in Google Ads, Meta Ads, LinkedIn and other platforms like Microsoft. We're a proud Premier Partner of Google, which is reserved for the top 3% of agency partners.

If you are in the need for a new agency, contact Rise and we'll customize a solution to drive business results.

A few traits of Rise:

Data-Driven to the Core

We let the data dictate strategy based on what’s working well, and what isn’t.

We Believe in Transparency

When we meet with our clients, we review a customized dashboard of our performance to show the return on investment.

Our North Star is Driving Business Growth

We focus less on impressions, and clicks, and more so on driving customers for our clients.

Always Evolving

We stay up to date with the latest advertising and marketing strategies to keep our clients at the forefront of the industry.

An Elite Team of Marketers

Our team is an elite group of marketing professionals, some with over 15 years of experience.

Success stories
Increased Law Firm Traffic by 162%

$1,400

2022

20 months

Challenge

The goal for for our client was to increase organic traffic to their websites. The more traffic one brings to their website, the more clients they are able to bring in. This is extremely important in a highly competitive field, such as law.

Solution

For this client, we started with 2 blogs and 1 guest blog per month, and eventually scaled up to 2 blogs and 2 guest blogs per month. This brought the number of keywords on clients site up from 119 in October 2021 to 936 currently.

Result

Initially, the site's traffic was 198 per month in October 2021, is currently experiencing monthly traffic of 520, an increase of 162%. In addition, they are currently the number one search result for 9 keywords, including very competitive keywords, such as “prenup divorce”.

Boosted Organic Traffic by 707%

$1,401

2021

30 months

Challenge

The goal for for our client was to increase organic traffic to their websites. The more traffic one brings to their website, the more clients they are able to bring in. This is extremely important in a highly competitive field, such as law.

Solution

After an initial audit, we focused on blog posts (2 per month, based on keyword research) and 2 guest blog posts per month. Through a solid cadence of valuable, targeted content, and guest blogs to boost domain authority, we took the site to new heights.

Result

The client's traffic began at 318 per month in January 2020, and increased to 2567 per month by August 2022, a substantial increase of 707%. What’s more, we were able to help the client rank in the top 5 search results for 27 keywords related to their law firm, and OUI/DUI law.

22% Improvement within 28 days!

$2,500

2023

2 months

Challenge

We were looking to optimize existing pages on a website. Instead of creating more and more content, we wanted to optimize existing content.

Solution

We implemented schema for the website, specifically blog schema and local business schema. For local business schema we uploaded all relevant service areas.

Result

Within 28 days impressions increased 25% and organic search traffic increased 22%. This was one of the most effective SEO strategies we implemented for this website.

Our clients
Our awards
Reviews
5
average rating based on Google reviews
Justin Labdon
on
Aug 28, 2024

My business engaged Rise to help with Google and Meta ad campaigns, after a disappointing experience with another agency last year. Our team from Rise of Gala and Ceci were very responsive and talented with both platforms, making constant tweaks and adjustments to optimize results. Would recommend their services!

Salem Co-operative Bank
on
Jun 4, 2024

We have been working with Rise Marketing Group to create a Google Analytics Looker Studio Dashboard, and our experience has been exceptional. Their team is knowledgeable, responsive, and dedicated to helping us achieve our business goals. Customer service is top-notch, always ready to assist with any questions we have.

Emily Cramer
on
Jun 5, 2024

Working with Ben and the Rise team has been incredibly meaningful to accomplishing our the goals of our research project, which aims to test the effectiveness of Facebook ads for study recruitment informed by community feedback compared to 'standard' ads. Ben has been so patient in explaining how Ads Manager works and what are the key indicators to look for. He is such a valuable member of the team, he has joined our team in preparing a manuscript! Highly recommend.

Wilson Hung
on
May 8, 2024

We hired Rise to help us launch on Adwords. Three main reasons why I recommend Rise: 1/ They're perfect for startups to go from v0->v1 to prove out the channel. They're extremely agile, nimble, and responsive. It helps when they have a full team of people who are experts at attribution, ad copy, reporting, and ad buying. So while my team was being built out, they were able to help out across multiple fuctions. 2/ The founder, Ben, is extremely approachable. Many agencies I work with, the founder just comes in for the sales call and then we never hear from them after the deal is closed. However, Ben checks in regularly to see how things are going and great suggestions. 3/ The team is fantastic. Our account manager was Ashley. She's very knowledgeable and what set her apart is not only does she identify opportunities, but she'll provide recommendations and a game plan to action it. Ultimately, we brought the channel in-house as we decided it was a core channel that we wanted to build internal capabilities for. But this was made possible because Rise did a fantastic job proving out the channel, and getting us to the point where we had confidence for increased investment. Highly recommend!

Alisha Lumea
on
Jul 2, 2024

Rise has been a great partner to Wulf's Fish. Their counsel has always been knowledgeable and with our objectives in mind. We tried many different digital agencies before Rise, and they have been the best by far.
